resources.string:
1. After first run of the application we need allow permissions for Alert Windows (for drawing widget), Phone State & Outgoing calls (for detection when we need to show widget). 
 2. To demonstrate widget's work we can turn ON/OFF widget inside of the app. 
 3. In the future widget will be shown by itself. 
 4. After outcoming call widget will be hidden. 
 5. During incoming call widget will be shown after you pick up the call. 
 6. After incoming call widget still will be on the screen . 
 7. Widget will be shown everytime during the calls even after device reboot.
